dao.name: QRY_SALES_MN
dao.statement: SELECT SALES_COD, SALES_NAM, HOTEL_SALES, BQ_SALES, MEMBER_SALES FROM SALES_MN WHERE ATHENA_ID = :athena_id and trim(CLASS_COD) = trim(:class_cod) ORDER BY SALES_COD

dao.name: CHK_SALES_CLASS_ISEXIST
dao.statement: select count(*) as sales_mn_count from sales_mn where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(class_cod) = trim(:class_cod) and rownum = 1

dao.name: QRY_SALES_MN_ORDER_BY_SALE_COD_AND_DECODE_STATUS_COD
dao.statement: SELECT SALES_COD, SALES_NAM, STATUS_COD, CLASS_COD, HOTEL_SALES, BQ_SALES, MEMBER_SALES, USER_NOS FROM SALES_MN WHERE ATHENA_ID = :athena_id

dao.name: QRY_SALES_MN_ALL_FIELDS_USER_NOS_BLANK
dao.statement: SELECT trim(SALES_COD) as sales_cod, trim(SALES_NAM) as sales_nam, STATUS_COD, CLASS_COD, HOTEL_SALES, BQ_SALES, MEMBER_SALES, USER_NOS, INS_DAT, INS_USR, UPD_DAT, UPD_USR,TEL_NOS FROM SALES_MN WHERE ATHENA_ID = :athena_id AND trim(SALES_COD)= trim(:sales_cod)

dao.name: QRY_SALES_MN_ALL_FIELDS
dao.statement: SELECT trim(a.SALES_COD) as sales_cod, trim(a.SALES_NAM) as sales_nam, a.STATUS_COD, a.CLASS_COD, a.HOTEL_SALES, a.BQ_SALES, a.MEMBER_SALES, a.USER_NOS, b.usr_cname, a.INS_DAT, a.INS_USR, a.UPD_DAT, a.UPD_USR,a.TEL_NOS FROM SALES_MN a JOIN s99_user b ON a.user_nos = b.usr_id WHERE ATHENA_ID = :athena_id AND trim(SALES_COD)= trim(:sales_cod)

dao.name: QRY_USER_NOS_IN_SALES_MN
dao.statement: select count(*) as user_nos_count from sales_mn where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(sales_cod)<> trim(:sales_cod) and trim(user_nos) = trim(:user_nos)

dao.name: SEL_SALES_MN
dao.statement: select sales_cod, sales_nam from sales_mn where athena_id = :athena_id
